title.narrative: 1.5 GRP- EDUCATION

description.narrative: 1.5: GRP-Education: Enhanced regional capacity based on tools, guides, evidence and monitoring capacity to influence and promote equity and gender-sensitive policies and opportunities to improve early childhood development, education, and learning and reduce risks of exclusion of all children from early years to secondary education, which contributes to Cross-Sectoral Early Childhood Development, Early Childhood Development, Early Learning, Education In Emergencies, Education â€“ General, Equitable Access To Quality Education, Equity â€“ Focus On Girls' And Inclusive Education, Learning And Child-Friendly Schools, Learning Outcomes, Skills Development. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Advocacy And Public Engagement, Fostering Innovation And Use Of New Technologies, Operational Support To Programme Delivery, Systems Strengthening And Institution Building. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: 001 Global and Regional Programme: Enhanced regional capacity related to evidence-based analysis, tools and advocacy and multi- country initiatives contributing to achieve the Strategic Plan targets with equity focus in the LAC region

title.narrative: 1.5: GRP-Education: Enhanced regional capacity based on tools, guides, evidence and monitoring capacity to influence and promoteequity and gender-sensitive policies and opportunities to improve early childhood development, education, and learning and reducerisks of exclusion of all children from early years to secondary education

description.narrative: By end 2017, LACRO enhanced regional capacity for the realization of the right of every child to inclusive ad quality ECD and education, with special emphasis on learning and excluded children, trough the development of regional public goods and advocacy and capacity-buildings strategies. | Status:Met | As-of Date:12/01/2018
